nodes.text: The Security Tower was a tower in Cloud City on Bespin used as a detention center by the Bespin Wing Guard.

When Darth Vader took control of Cloud City following the Battle of Hoth, Baron Administrator Lando Calrissian, Lobot and a squad of Wing Guards set an ambush for the stormtroopers escorting Leia Organa and Chewbacca. Stripped of their weapons, the troopers were taken to the Security Tower.
The card Security Tower of CCG - Cloud City Limited located the rooms of The Empire Strikes Back where Han Solo and Chewbacca were imprisoned in the Security Tower.
